title: Eiyuden Chronicle: Hundred Heroes - Character Tier List
description: This is a tier list for the characters in Eiyuden Chronicle: Hundred Heroes. The list is divided into S Tier, A Tier, B Tier, and C Tier. The characters in S Tier are the most powerful, while the characters in C Tier are the least powerful. The tier list is based on the characters overall strength, usefulness, and versatility. However, it is important to note that this is just a general tier list, and the best characters for you will depend on your playstyle and team composition.
heading: Eiyuden Chronicle: Hundred Heroes - Character Tier List
